TopicTitle: My ksp is lagging like crazy, but i did'nt 2 hours ago! HELP!

Articles.Content:
My ksp is lagging so hard, i only have 1 fps, i was playing it earlier and then everything was all sunshine and buttercups, but now its hard even to open my saves! I have MSI GE60 so no lack in computing power, i was just wondering if someone had a fix for this, and yes i have tried to restart and lower my graphic settings.

Thenks
Hi @Jeb is dead?, please set your laptops powersave mode to performance and make sure it is plugged in
